content: skill level easy level 2 lion brand pattern # 10207 center square mc homespun® article #790 6 balls border chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* a 300 yards b 300 yards *super bulky weight yarn can be substituted* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm gauge round 1 should measure 3¼ x 3¼ 8 25 cm using larger hook and 2 strands of homespun 8 stitches = 4 10 cm 4 rounds border = 4½ with smaller hook and 1 strand chenille thick & quick center with larger hook and 2 strands homespun work in pattern until piece measures 34 x 34 approximately 15 rounds border work rounds with smaller hook and 1 strand of chenille thick & quick super bulky yarn in color a and color b finish with optional tassels *ed note border could be worked in homespun using 2 strands of yarn and larger hook * available in different versions big granny square afghan 10207 1 december 2002 *cctq-biggrannysquareafghan pdf* published in crafts crochet fantasy crochet magazine knit it michael s create *with tassels photo tutorial provided * simple crocheted afghan 2 july 2005 *chs-simpleafghan pdf* published in better homes and gardens *without tassels* 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/cctq-biggrannysquareafghan html 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/chs-simpleafghan html
